knowledgeGraph.title: UCLA Santa Monica Medical Center
knowledgeGraph.description: UCLA Santa Monica Medical Center is a Teaching hospital located within the city of Santa Monica, California. The hospital was founded in 1926, and is a member of the UCLA Health.

organic.title: Santa Monica Medical Center | UCLA Health
organic.snippet: Visit the UCLA Health Santa Monica Medical Center for your emergency & immediate care needs, as well as surgery and specialty care.

organic.title: Departments & Services - UCLA Santa Monica Medical Center
organic.snippet: UCLA Health also includes convenient primary and specialty offices throughout the city. We're here for you with the best doctors and medical services - ...

organic.title: UCLA Medical Center, Santa Monica | Clinical and Translational ...
organic.snippet: The 281-bed, full-service medical center provides the complete continuum of healthcare services, from prenatal and neonatal care to geriatric medicine.

organic.title: UCLA Health Careers - Home page
organic.snippet: We'd love to connect with you and share more about the exciting and rewarding opportunities you can explore at UCLA Health.
